content:
UNITED STATES SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION
Washington, D.C. 20549
FORM 10-K
ANNUAL REPORT PURSUANT TO SECTION 13 OR 15(d) OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF 1934
For the fiscal year ended December 31, 2023
CATERPILLAR INC.
Item 1. BUSINESS
Caterpillar Inc. (the Company) is a leading manufacturer of construction and mining equipment, diesel and natural gas engines, and industrial gas turbines. The Company operates in three principal segments: Construction Industries, Resource Industries, and Energy & Transportation. The Company's products and services include machinery, engines, and financial products. The Company is committed to sustainability and digital transformation initiatives including automation and connectivity solutions.
